title: If you could un-invent anything from existence, what would it be? - Quora

response.answer_text: If i could uninvent anything from existence, i think the thing that i would defintely do first would be.. Ketchup Chips.  Now, to understand why i don't like them you first have to go through a history of my experience with them. Because they are available in canada, and not a lot of other countries some people love ketchup chips because they can only get them there. I have tried ketchup chips and although it may seem “delicious”, it’s actually really disgusting. One kid ate them near the dryer and it stunk up the whole school and washroom mixed in a hint of… ####.

The idea that Rulers are divine or have divine sanction for their “rule” BS. The reason that I don't choose “Gods” as an invention is that believing in an invisible daddy or visible rock is less important than how Humans have used those ideas to control others…
